q: select alg/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/value/value, med/activities[at0001]/description[at0002]/items[at0070]/value/value from EHR e contains (COMPOSITION c1 contains EVALUATION alg[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1] AND COMPOSITION c2 contains INSTRUCTION med[openEHR-EHR-INSTRUCTION.medication_order.v3])
